def Load(widget):
entity = getRegistroPai(widget) if entity == None: return
if int(entity.Fields["INFOOPERACAO"].Value) == 3: if widget.View.Commands["New"] != None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
def getRegistroPai(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityAssociation
parentNode = widget.Breadcrumb.Parent #raise Exception(parentNode.Entity.PhysicalTableName) entityDefinitionEmpSoft = EntityDefinition.GetByName(parentNode.Entity.SystemInstanceName, parentNode.Entity.PhysicalTableName) registroEmpSoft = EntityAssociation(parentNode.Entity.Handle, entityDefinitionEmpSoft).Instance
if not registroEmpSoft.Fields.ContainsKey("R1000"): return
entityDefinitionR1000 = EntityDefinition.GetByName(parentNode.Entity.SystemInstanceName, "REINF_R1000") registro = EntityAssociation(registroEmpSoft.Fields["R1000"].Handle, entityDefinitionR1000).Instance
return registro
